item.title: 梅洛尼寻求缩减华人在意大利重要公司的持股比例
item.description: 乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）政府正在考虑限制中国投资者在关键公司持股的计划，以避免与美国发生潜在的紧张关系。【原文：Giorgia Meloni’s government is considering plans to curb Chinese investors’ holdings at key companies to avoid potential tensions with the US.】

item.title: 以太基金吸引创纪录的 10 亿美元，企业囤积规模扩大
item.description: 随着第二大加密货币以太币涨至近四年来的最高水平，专注于以太币的美国交易所交易基金创下单日最大流入量。【原文：US exchange-traded funds focused on Ether notched their biggest single-day inflow as the second-largest cryptocurrency rallied to its highest level in nearly four years.】

item.title: 道达尔计划在纳米比亚重大发现附近的南非开采石油
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）正计划在南非近海开展新一轮钻探活动，该海域面积广阔，邻近的纳米比亚也有重大石油发现。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is planning a fresh drilling campaign offshore South Africa in a vast basin that includes major oil discoveries in neighboring Namibia.】

item.title: 中国在调查后对加拿大油菜籽征收临时关税
item.description: 在一项反倾销调查之后，中国决定对加拿大进口的油菜籽征收关税，这扰乱了农作物的流通，加剧了双方之间的贸易争端。【原文：China has decided to place tariffs on Canadian rapeseed imports following an anti-dumping probe, disrupting crop flows and adding to a trade spat between the two sides.】

item.title: 因担心食品配送问题，瓜子股价创四个月最大跌幅
item.description: 由于担心中国直播平台进军中国炙手可热的食品外卖行业，瓜子二手车股价周二创下四个月来最大跌幅。【原文：Kuaishou Technology shares tumbled the most in four months Tuesday on concerns over the Chinese live-streaming platform’s entry into the nation’s red-hot food delivery sector.】

item.title: 沙普尔吉希望在塔塔可能退出时偿还 10 亿美元债务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度 Shapoorji Pallonji 集团计划将可能出售所持 Tata Sons Pvt. 18.4% 股份的部分收益用于偿还其基础设施部门的债务。【原文：India’s Shapoorji Pallonji Group plans to use some of the proceeds from a potential sale of its 18.4% stake in Tata Sons Pvt. to repay debt held by its infrastructure unit, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普与普京峰会前俄罗斯保持原油出口畅通
item.description:
对印度征收额外关税的威胁并未影响俄罗斯港口的原油运输

。【原文：

Threat of additional tariffs on India hasn’t impacted crude shipments from Russian ports

】

item.title: 中国商务部专家认为美国停战仍存在不确定性
item.description: 据北京商务部的一位高级研究员称，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将对中国商品加征关税的暂停期延长了三个月，但世界上最大的两个经济体之间的贸易关系仍然容易受到不确定性的影响。【原文：Trade ties between the world’s two biggest economies remain vulnerable to uncertainty even though President Donald Trump extended a pause for elevated tariffs on Chinese goods for another three months, according to a senior researcher at the Ministry of Commerce in Beijing.】

item.title: 先知先觉的基金押注短期南非债券
item.description: Prescient 投资管理公司加倍看好短期南非政府债券，强调在当前的全球逆风中，这些债券对新兴市场投资者的吸引力。【原文：Prescient Investment Management is doubling down on short-duration South African government bonds, highlighting their attractiveness for emerging market investors amid the current global headwinds.】

item.title: 前 OpenAI 研究员筹集资金支持新兴人才
item.description: Leonis Capital 已为一个新基金筹集到 2500 万美元，以帮助发掘下一个 OpenAI。【原文：Leonis Capital has secured $25 million for a new fund to help uncover the next OpenAI.】

item.title: 印度债券将因担心供应增加而扩大跌幅
item.description: 印度债券跌至四个月低点，分析师警告称，由于担心政府可能会增加借贷以资助潜在的财政刺激措施，从而应对美国的巨额关税，印度债券将进一步下跌。【原文：Indian bonds dropped to a four-month low, as analysts warned of further losses amid concerns that the government may increase borrowing to fund a potential fiscal stimulus in response to steep US tariffs.】

item.title: 里夫斯增税后，英国失去的工作岗位少于预期
item.description: 英国的就业市场似乎已经度过了工党政府增税260亿英镑（350亿美元）的最糟糕时期，7月份的薪资仅减少了8000人，这是自1月份以来的最低降幅。【原文：Britain’s jobs market appears to be past the worst of a £26 billion ($35 billion) tax hike by the Labour government, with payrolls falling only 8,000 in July — the lowest drop since January.】

item.title: 欧洲阿丽亚娜 6 火箭计划在 SpaceX 挑战赛中发射
item.description: 对于欧洲大陆减少对埃隆-马斯克的 SpaceX 公司依赖的目标来说，一枚陷入困境的欧洲火箭至关重要。【原文：A troubled European rocket critical to the continent’s goal of reducing its reliance on Elon Musk’s SpaceX is set to thunder off a launchpad for only its third-ever mission.】

item.title: 挪威 1.9 万亿美元财富基金上半年回报率为 5.7
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金的回报率为 5.7%，略微偏离了 2025 年前六个月的目标。【原文：Norway’s sovereign wealth fund returned 5.7% and slightly missed its target in the first six months of 2025.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国工资增长 5%，符合预期
尽管国内需求不断增长，马来西亚国家石油公司仍将扩大液化天然气出口
item.description: 马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.【原文：Petroliam Nasional Bhd. is seeking to expand its liquefied natural gas exports to growing Asian markets while also supporting Malaysia’s rising energy needs, which are partly driven by a data-center boom.】

item.title: 中国在新指南中敦促企业不要使用英伟达 H20 芯片
item.description: 中国已敦促当地公司避免使用英伟达公司的 H20 处理器，尤其是用于与政府相关的用途，这使得这家芯片制造商试图挽回数十亿中国收入损失的努力以及特朗普政府史无前例地推动将这些销售转化为美国政府意外之财的努力变得更加复杂。【原文：China has urged local companies to avoid using Nvidia Corp.’s H20 processors, particularly for government-related purposes, complicating the chipmaker’s attempts to recoup billions in lost China revenue as well as the Trump administration’s unprecedented push to turn those sales into a US government windfall.】

item.title: 在与特朗普对峙之际，卢拉继莫迪、普京之后又与习近平通话
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）在与印度和俄罗斯领导人会谈后与中国总统进行了交谈，这是他在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将拉美最大的经济体推入其全球贸易战之后与盟国进行的外联活动的一部分。【原文：Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva spoke with his Chinese counterpart following talks with the leaders of India and Russia, as part of his outreach to allies after Donald Trump thrust Latin America’s biggest economy into the middle of his global trade war.】

item.title: 中国 30 年期国债收益率因贸易乐观情绪升至四个月高点
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）延长了与中国的关税休战期，刺激了世界两大经济体改善贸易关系的希望，中国的 30 年期国债收益率升至 4 月份以来的最高点。【原文：China’s 30-year bond yields rose to the highest since April as President Donald Trump’s extension of a tariff truce with China spurred hopes of better trade ties between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行第三次降息，将利率降至 2023 年 4 月以来最低点
item.description: 澳大利亚央行今年第三次下调了关键利率，同时表示未来的政策决定将取决于即将公布的数据。【原文：Australia’s central bank trimmed its key interest rate for a third time this year, while signaling future policy decisions will hinge on incoming data.】

item.title: 锂矿商股价重拾涨势，中国产量成为关注焦点
item.description: 由于市场对中国电池金属产量的前景进行了权衡，锂生产商的股价继周一因一个大型矿场关闭而大幅上涨之后出现下跌。【原文：Lithium producers’ shares fell — following sharp gains on Monday that were driven by the closure of a major mine closure — as the market weighed the outlook for Chinese output of the battery metal.】

item.title: 谈判陷入僵局，香港建筑商侨福寻求贷款延期
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，香港开发商侨福集团（Parkview Group Ltd.）正在寻求将周五到期的一笔 9.4 亿美元贷款延期三个月，以争取更多时间与银行谈判再融资协议。【原文：Hong Kong developer Parkview Group Ltd. is seeking a three-month extension on a $940 million loan due Friday, in a bid to get more time to negotiate a refinancing deal with banks, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 普拉博沃的食品产业主管以零预算为由辞职
item.description: 一家国有农业公司的负责人在上任六个月后辞职，称该公司没有从总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的政府那里获得任何资助，这使印度尼西亚提高粮食自给率的努力遭遇挫折。【原文：Indonesia’s push to boost food self-sufficiency suffered a setback after the head of a state-owned farming firm resigned six months into the job, saying the company hadn’t received any funding from the government of President Prabowo Subianto.】

item.title: 民族主义与薯片相得益彰
item.description:
市场认为，作为交易的一部分，美国将获得英伟达在中国销售额的 15%。【原文：

Markets view the US taking 15% of Nvidia’s sales to China as part of the deal.

】

item.title: 特朗普延长与中国的贸易休战后大豆期货下跌
item.description: 大豆价格回落到每蒲式耳 10 美元以下，因为交易商认为，中美贸易休战延长的消息可能会将两国之间的主要谷物采购交易推迟到今年年底。【原文：Soybean prices fell back below $10 a bushel, as traders saw news of an extended US-China trade truce as likely delaying major grain-purchasing deals between the nations until late this year.】

item.title: 因避风港上诉，CBA 空头押注降至三年来最低
item.description: 受澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）"避风港 "美誉的支撑，对该股的看跌押注已跌至三年来的最低点。【原文：Bearish wagers on Commonwealth Bank of Australia have tumbled to the lowest in three years, supported by the stock’s reputation as a haven.】

item.title: 让欧元绽放光芒需要的不仅仅是特朗普
item.description:
对美元的担忧提升了单一货币的形象，但欧洲仍有内部分歧需要解决。【原文：

Anxiety over the dollar has boosted the single currency’s profile, but Europe still has internal differences to resolve.

】

item.title: 受关税影响的南非瞄准亚洲买家购买农产品
item.description: 南非正努力在亚洲和其他地区为其农产品开拓新市场，这些农产品受到了美国惩罚性进口关税的打击。【原文：South Africa is trying to open up new markets in Asia and elsewhere for its farm produce that has been hit with punitive US import tariffs.】

item.title: 绿洲》会加剧英国的通胀困境吗？绝对可能
item.description: 绿洲 "乐队的复出巡演似乎将加剧英国通胀率的回升，使已经令英格兰银行产生分歧的棘手局面变得更加复杂。【原文：The Oasis comeback tour looks set to add to a resurgence of inflation in the UK, complicating an already tricky situation that has divided the Bank of England.】

item.title: 交易商关注中国阅兵式的钢铁减产，铁矿石涨势扩大
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天上涨，原因是交易商重点关注中国政府将在下月北京阅兵式前实施钢铁减产的预期。【原文：Iron ore rose for a second day, as traders focused on expectations that the Chinese government will enforce steel production cuts ahead of next month’s military parade in Beijing.】
